doc:
Gerald Lawrence https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gerald_Lawrence 0 Gerald Lawrence (23 March 1873, London – 16 May 1957, London) was a British actor. He was married, firstly, to actress Dame Lilian Braithwaite; their child was actress Joyce Carey (born Joyce Lawrence). That union ended in divorce in 1905. His second and third wives were also actresses; those unions were without issue. His second marriage, to Fay Davis, ended with her death in 1945 and his third, to Madge Compton, with his own. Gerald_Lawrence ( 23_March_1873 , London – 16_May_1957 , London ) was a_British_actor . He was_married , firstly , to actress_Dame_Lilian_Braithwaite ; their_child was actress_Joyce_Carey_( born Joyce_Lawrence_) . That_union ended in divorce in 1905 . His_second_and_third_wives were also actresses ; those_unions were without issue . His_second_marriage , to Fay_Davis , ended with her_death in 1945 and his_third , to Madge_Compton , with his_own .
